get.summary: Get trending products in a category

post.summary: Submit one of multiple payload types in a single endpoint
post.description: Accepts different JSON shapes distinguished by a top-level "type" field.

role.description: Accepted values (not restricted): superadmin, admin, manager, support, seller, buyer, warehouse

status.description: Accepted values (not restricted): active, inactive, pending, banned

size.description: Accepted values (not restricted): XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL

items.description: Accepted values (not restricted): featured, bestseller, limited, exclusive, recommended, premium

method.description: Accepted values (not restricted): credit_card, paypal, bank_transfer

status.description: Accepted values (not restricted): pending, processing, shipped, delivered, cancelled
Accepted values (not restricted): pending, failed, cancelled, returned, delivered
